input.sentences: it was a rainy day for the marathon race .
some racers were in excellent form and taking the race very seriously .
some racers were in a wheelchair and demonstrating significant prowess .
some of the spectators decided to run | but in the opposite direction of the racers .
the not-so-serious racers brought up the rear of the race | yet a good time was had by all .
output.sentences: The reporters spoke highly of the triathlon event in downtown.
Many racers competed in the event in downtown as the spectators cheered.
There were even quadriplegic event for the race.
The downtown race had a huge turnout and a lot of people competed.
At the end of the race was a fun run with some in costume.
